name: GreenIsland
description:
You need to survive on this unknown island after your helicopter
crashed. you are a part of a military group. you was sent here to investigate.
now you need to survive and mine resources and trees and you can mine iron copper silver and coal to use to survive.
you can build a house and a well pump and a blast furnace and more stuff to build with.
or you can go into caves and explosm and mine the resource in them.
the local people would not be happy with you or you can take out the local inhabitants.

Gameplay
you need to pick up your axe and your pickaxe and your gun.
you can explore all 4 caves.
or you can build a house or cab build a blast furnace.

features
you can pickup a gun and a pickaxe and a axe.
you need to find food and water and you can open boxs to find food and water.
you can build up to 10 items.
and you can turn your weapon into a single shot or full auto
